CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The series resistance of PQCDTB exhibited low value compared to that of PCZDTB.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB". These are the names of the materials being compared in the series resistance evaluation.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB". These are the only clear "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, as they are the names of the materials being compared in the series resistance evaluation. Other terms, such as "series resistance", are not material names and have been removed from the table.

After re-evaluating the paragraph, the only valid "Property Value" entity is "low value", which refers to the value of the series resistance of PQCDTB. The other entity, "that of PCZDTB", is a comparison value and does not clearly refer to a "Value of material property".
